comments: I\'ve never been very good at understanding abstract concepts, but somehow with Dr. Nilges it was easy. He\'s really fun, pretty laid back, and he loves to reference pop culture in his lectures. He\'s really flexible based on how much everyone\'s read and planning due dates. Really fun to listen to him talk, he really knows what he\'s doing.

comments: I\'m in my fourth year now, and Dr. Nilges is by far the best prof I\'ve had. He\'s so smart it\'s sometimes almost scary. He is kind, caring, easy to talk to and always available for help. He really wants his students to do well. Readings are tough and complicated, but his explanations are great. Get ready to have your mind blown every single class.

comments: Extremely friendly and intelligent with a laid back teaching style, but a really hard marker. The short stories and novels for the class are usually long, boring, and difficult to understand. High school level english won\'t cut it. Wouldn\'t recommend for first years, but if english is your strong suit you\'ll probably love him.
